attributes.action: DO NOT PREVENT the Donald Trump state visit to the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
We should freely allow the arrival of the honourable President of the United States, Donald Trump.
Donald Trump, a President who in just a few weeks, has shown more leadership and action, than Obama did in 8 years.

Freedoms of speech are what we value in our western nations, so why do we go so far to silence them? Liberal protesters act like the very fascists they accuse Trump supporters & Brexiters of being.
Donald Trump's visit is a great sign for future relations between the UK & America.
attributes.background:

A President who in just a few weeks, has shown more leadership and action, than Obama did in eight years.
